title: Melvor Game Data Package
description: A game data package for Melvor Idle

namespace.description: Unique namespace for the game data. For Modded Data Packages, this is defined by the manifest.json and has no effect.

GameData.description: Contains the data used to construct game objects

monsters.description: Monsters defined by this data package

dungeons.description: Dungeons defined by this data package

dungeonDisplayOrder.description: Determines the display order of dungeons

prayers.description: ActivePrayers defined by this data package

skillData.description: Contains data that should be registered to skills. Supports custom skill data.

randomGems.description: Determines the drops in the standard gem table.

randomSuperiorGems.description: Determines the drops in the superior gem table.

itmMonsters.description: Determines the list of monsters the Into the Mist Dungeon should choose from.

spiderLairMonsters.description: Determines the list of monsters the Spider Lair Dungeons should choose from.

pages.description: Pages defined by this data package.

bankSortOrder.description: Determines the default sort order for items in the bank.

lore.description: LoreBooks defined by this data package.

itemID.description: The ID of the item that can drop

minQuantity.description: The minimum quantity of the item that is dropped

maxQuantity.description: The maximum quantity of the item that is dropped

weight.description: The weight of the drop. Higher values respresent more common items

isPotionActive.description: Optional. If present, the skill having a potion active must match

succesful.description: Optional. If present, the skill action being succesful must match

activePotionIDs.description: Optional. If present, the ID of the active potion for the skill must match an element of the array

WoodcuttingEventMatcherOptions.description: Matches when a Woodcutting action occurs

cookedVersionExists.description: Optional. If present, the normal action reward having a Cooked version must match

character.description: The character to use to determine the damage amount

maxRoll.description: The method to compute the maximum damage dealt

maxPercent.description: The magnitude of the damage. Effect depends on the value of maxRoll

attackCount.description: Optional. If present on a Mult-hit Special attack, the damage will only be dealt on this hit of the attack

roll.description: Determines if the damage should roll between a minimum and maximum value

minRoll.description: The method to compute the minimum damage dealt

minPercent.description: The magnitude of the minimum damage. Effect depends on the value of minRoll

roll.description: Determines if the damage should roll between a minimum and maximum value

NormalDamageData.description: Convenience data type for defining damage based on normal attack damage

amplitude.description: Percent of normal damage to scale by

attackCount.description: Optional. If present, damage only occurs on the specified proc of the special attack

CustomDamageData.description: Defines customized damage for a special attack

modifiers.description: Modifiers that are applied to the target character. Values are multiplied by the number of stacks active

maxStacks.description: The maximum number of stacks of this effect that can be applied at once

stacksToAdd.description: The number of stacks of this effect that are added per proc

character.description: The character that this effect should be applied to.

turns.description: The number of turns the effect lasts for. 0 specifies that it only lasts for the duration of the Special Attack. 'Infinity' specifies that it lasts until the end of the fight.

countsOn.description: The character that the turn timer counts down on

media.description: The icon that is displayed for the effect

turns.description: The number of turns the target should Sleep for

hitpointThreshold.description: Optional. If present, this effect will only be applied when the target's hitpoint percent is less than or equal to this value

turns.description: The number of turns the target should be Stunned for

flavour.description: Determines if the effect is classified as Stun or Freeze

DOTEffect.description: Defines a custom DOT effect. DOT effects apply damage over time, or healing over time.

subtype.description: The type of DOT that should be applied.

procs.description: The number of times the DOT should deal damage

damage.description: Array of Damage, that is summed to compute the total DOT damage

interval.description: The interval between DOT procs in [ms]

ReflexiveEffectData.description: Defines a custom reflexive effect. Reflexive effects increase in stack each time the target character is hit.

modifiers.description: Modifiers that are applied to the character that has this effect. Multiplied by the number of stacks the effect has.

maxStacks.description: The maximum number of stacks this effect can reach

media.description: The icon that is displayed for the effect

turns.description: The number of turns that this effect lasts. 'Infinity' indicates the effect lasts until the end of the fight. 0 indicates it only lasts the duration of the attack.

name.description: The display name of the effect

CompoundEffect.description: Defines a custom compound effect. A meta-effect, randomly applys one of the subsequent effects in the effect array.

numEffects.description: The number of subsequent effects in the effect array to randomly select from.

ComboEffect.description: Defines a custom combo effect. Combo effects gain stacks each time the attacker succesfully hits thier target. All stacks are removed on a missed attack.

maxStacks.description: The maximum number of stacks the effect can have

modifiers.description: The modifiers that are applied to the target. Values are multiplied by the number of stacks of the effect

media.description: The icon that is displayed for the effect

EffectChance.description: The Percentage chance that the effect should proc

SlowEffectData.description: Defines a SlowEffect object. Impacted by modifiers and conditions that specify Slow.

magnitude.description: Percentage value that the effect should increase attack interval by

turns.description: Number of target character turns the effect should last for

BurnEffectData.description: Defines a Burn DOT Effect, with the standard damage and duration

PoisonEffectData.description: Defines a Poison DOT Effect, with the standard damage and duration

FrostBurnEffectData.description: Defines the standard Frostburn effect. Impacted by modifiers and conditions that specify Frostburn

id.description: The ID of the StackingEffect object this effect represents.

AfflictionEffectData.description: Defines the standard Affliction effect. Impacted by modifiers and conditions that specify Affliction

CustomEffectData.description: Defines a custom effect that is not specified by a standard type

curse.description: The ID of the Curse the effect should apply

chance.description: Optional. The percentage chance that the effect is applied. Defaults to 100%

isRandom.description: Optional. If set to true, the effect will select from all registered Curse spells instead of the specified value. Defaults to false.

DeadlyPoisonEffectData.description: Defines a Deadly Poison DOT Effect, with the standard damage and duration

skillID.description: The ID of the Skill that must have a level greater than or equal to level

level.description: The minimum level the Skill must have
The minimum level that all Skills must have

exceptions.description: Optional. If present, the skill IDs in the array will not be included in the requirement

dungeonID.description: The ID of the Dungeon that must be completed

count.description: The number of times the dungeon must be completed

percent.description: The percent total completion the player must have

purchaseID.description: The ID of the shop purchase that must be bought

count.description: The number of times the purchase must be bought

itemID.description: The ID of the EquipmentItem that must be equipped

tier.description: The minimum tier of slayer task that must be completed

count.description: The number of Slayer Tasks of the tier or higher that must be completed

count.description: The number of times the monster must be killed

The number of Township Tutorial tasks that must be completed

buildingID.description: The ID of the building that must be actively built

count.description: The number of buildings that must be actively built

inverted.description: If the condition should be inverted. e.g. !condition

HitpointsCondition.description: Compares the hitpoints percent of the specified character with value

DOTCondition.description: Requires that character has a DOT of the specified type

dotType.description: The DOT subtype that must be on the character

ModifierEffectCondition.description: Requires that character has a Modifier Effect of the specified type

effectType.description: Specifies the modifier effect that must be on the character.

AttackTypeCondition.description: Requires that the character and their target have the specified Combat Styles

thisAttackType.description: The combat style that the character must use

targetAttackType.description: The combat style that the character's target must use

IsFightingCondition.description: Requires that the player is fighting something

StunnedCondition.description: Requires that the specified character is stunned/frozen

flavour.description: Optional. If present, the stun flavour on the character must match, otherwise matches both stuns and freezes

SleepingCondition.description: Requires that the specified character is sleeping

ItemInBankConditionData.description: Compares the quantity of the specified item in the bank with value

itemID.description: The ID of the item that must be present in the bank

ItemChargeConditionData.description: Compares the quantity of item charges of the equipment item with value

itemID.description: The ID of the equipment item that has charges

EveryConditionData.description: Requires that all of the conditions be met

conditions.description: Array of conditions that must all be met

SomeConditionData.description: Requires that any of the conditions are met

conditions.description: Array of conditions that at least one must be met

FightingBossCondition.description: Requires that the Player is fighting a Boss monster

EquipStatCompareCondition.description: Compares the Player's base equipment stat with the Enemies

character.description: The character that must have the condition

condition.description: The condition that must be matched for the modifiers provided to be active

modifiers.description: Modifiers provided to the player if the condition is met

enemyModifiers.description: Modifiers provided to the enemy if the condition is met

petID.description: The ID of the pet to roll for

weight.description: Determines the chance of the pet. Rolls at 1/weight probability.

modifier.description: The non-skill modifier key that should be applied to the player

magnitude.description: The base value that the modifier should have

modifier.description: The combat modifier key that should be applied to the enemy

magnitude.description: The base value that the modifier should have

FixedCost.description: A fixed cost per purchase in the shop

cost.description: The cost per purchase. Can be set to 0 to indicate no cost.

LinearCost.description: A linearly scaling cost per purchase in the shop

initial.description: The cost of the first purchase

scaling.description: The amount the cost should increase per purchase made

BankSlotCost.description: A cost that scales according the bank slot cost formula per purchase in the shop

GloveCost.description: A fixed cost that can be reduced if the player has read the merchant's permit

name.description: The display name for the item

category.description: Category for item, utilized for searching

type.description: Type for item, utilized for searching

altMedia.description: URI of an alternative image for the item

ignoreCompletion.description: Determines if the item should not count for item completion

obtainFromItemLog.description: Determines if the item should be obtainable by clicking on it in the item log

golbinRaidExclusive.description: Determines if the item should only show up in the Golbin Raid Minigame

customDescription.description: Optional. If present, the item will use this description instead of the default autogenerated one.

sellsFor.description: Base sale price for the item

category.description: Category for item, utilized for searching

type.description: Type for item, utilized for searching

sellsFor.description: Base sale price for the item

key.description: The equipment stat that is provided

value.description: The value of the equipment stat provided

tier.description: Classification for the tier of item. Currently only effects which items can be converted to Clothing in township

validSlots.description: The valid equipment slots that this item can be equipped to.

occupiesSlots.description: Equipment slots that will also be occupied by this item, in addition to one of the validSlots. Typical usecase is to make a weapon 2-Handed

equipRequirements.description: Array of requirements that are needed in order to equip this item

equipmentStats.description: Equipment stats that are provided by this item. Do not apply if item is in the Passive slot.

enemyModifiers.description: Optional. Modifiers that are provided to Enemies/Monsters when the item is equipped.

specialAttacks.description: Optional. An array of Special Attack IDs that are provided when the item is equipped.

fightEffects.description: Optional. An array of ItemEffect IDs that are provided in combat by this item.

providedRunes.description: Optional. An array of runes that are provided by this item.

ammoType.description: Only required if one of the validSlots for this item is Quiver. Specifies the types of weapons this item can supply with ammunition.

consumesChargesOn.description: Optional. Only utilized if this item participates in the Item Charges subsystem. Specifies an array of GameEventMatchers, which on a successful match will consume a single item charge.

consumesOn.description: Optional. Specifies an array of GameEventMatchers, which on a successful match will consume one of the equipped item. Best utilized for the Quiver, Summon1, Summon2, and Consumable slots.

consumesItemOn.description: Optional. If present, specifies that an item in the bank will be consumed if a successful GameEvent matches

itemID.description: The ID of the item in the bank to be consumed

chance.description: The percentage chance that the item is consumed when an event matches

matchers.description: Specifies an array of GameEventMatchers, which on a successful match will roll to consume an item from the bank.

tier.description: Classification for the tier of item. Currently only effects which items can be converted to Clothing in township

validSlots.description: The valid equipment slots that this item can be equipped to.

occupiesSlots.description: Equipment slots that will also be occupied by this item, in addition to one of the validSlots. Typical usecase is to make a weapon 2-Handed

equipmentStats.description: Equipment stats that are provided by this item. Do not apply if item is in the Passive slot.

enemyModifiers.description: Modifiers that are provided to Enemies/Monsters when the item is equipped.

specialAttacks.description: Special Attack IDs that are provided when the item is equipped.

fightEffects.description: ItemEffect IDs that are provided in combat by this item.

providedRunes.description: Runes that are provided by this item.

ammoType.description: Only required if one of the validSlots for this item is Quiver. Specifies the types of weapons this item can supply with ammunition. Set to null to remove ammoType.

attackType.description: Determines which combat style this weapon enables the player to use

ammoTypeRequired.description: Optional. If present this weapon requires an item to be equipped in the Quiver with a matching AmmoType to attack

attackType.description: Determines which combat style this weapon enables the player to use

ammoTypeRequired.description: This weapon requires an item to be equipped in the Quiver with a matching AmmoType to attack. Set to null to not consume ammo.

healsFor.description: The base healing value of the food. Specified as 1/10th of the desired value in Standard Mode.
The base healing value of the food. Specified as 1/10th of the desired value in Standard Mode.

prayerPoints.description: The base number of prayer points obtained by burying the item
The base number of prayer points obtained by burying the item

modifiers.description: Modifiers provided to the Player when the potion is in use

charges.description: The base quantity of charges the potion provides per use

swalData.description: Optional. If present, specifies data for a SweetAlert2 modal to be fired.

dropTable.description: Defines the items that can be obtained by opening this item

keyItem.description: Optional. If present, this item is required to open the item. The quantity provided will be consumed per item opened.

dropTable.description: Defines the items that can be obtained by opening this item

Modifiers that are provided once for each time the item has been claimed. If the masteryToken modifier is present, this item acts as a Mastery Token instead, and provides Mastery Pool XP when claimed, proportional to the modifier value.

compostValue.description: The percent value that using this item will fill the compost meter in farming by.

harvestBonus.description: The percent value that using this item will increase the quantity of crops harvested by.

GamemodeData.description: Data for constructing a Gamemode object

name.description: Display name of the Gamemode

description.description: Optional. Description of the Gamemode displayed on the Character Select screen

rules.description: List of rules that are specific to the Gamemode. Displayed on the Character Select screen

textClass.description: CSS class used on the character select screen to specify the colour of the Gamemode's name

btnClass.description: CSS class used on the character select screen to specify the style of both Gamemode Selection and Created Characters

isPermaDeath.description: If true, dying in this Gamemode will delete the save file

isEvent.description: If true, a notice will be shown that this gamemode is Time limited on the character select screen

startDate.description: Optional. If present, respresents the Unix timestamp at which the Gamemode is available to play

endDate.description: Represents the Unix timestamp at which the Gamemode is no longer available to play. If set to 0, the Gamemode is always available.

combatTriangle.description: The combat triangle utilized in the Gamemode. 0 specifies the Standard Triangle. 1 specifies the Hardcore Triangle. 2 specifies the inverted Hardcore triangle.

hitpointMultiplier.description: All hitpoint and damage values will be multiplied by this value. The Standard value is 10.

hasRegen.description: Determines if the Player has passive hitpoint regeneration

capNonCombatSkillLevels.description: Determines if Non-Combat skills will be capped by the Player's combat level

startingPage.description: ID of the page that the game should change to after the Tutorial has been completed

startingItems.description: The items that the Player starts with upon completing the Tutorial

allowSkillUnlock.description: If the Gamemode allows for skills to be unlocked for a GP cost

startingSkills.description: Optional. Array of Skill IDs that the player should start with in the gamemode. If unset, the player starts with all skills.

skillUnlockCost.description: Array of GP costs to unlock new skills in the gamemode. If the number of skills unlocked exceeds the length of this array, the last element will be utilized as the cost. Has no effect if allowSkillUnlock is false.

playerModifiers.description: Modifiers that will be applied to the Player at all times

enemyModifiers.description: Modifiers that will be applied to all Enemies/Monsters

hasTutorial.description: Determines if the Player has access to the tutorial on creating a new save

ItemEffectData.description: Data for constructing an ItemEffect object

AttackStyleData.description: Data for constructing an AttackStyle object

modifiers.description: Modifiers provided to the player when using this attack style

experienceGain.description: Experience that is gained when dealing damage with this attack style

skillID.description: The ID of the skill that should gain experience

ratio.description: The amount of experience gained per hitpoint multiplier normalized point of damage dealt.

attackType.description: The combat style the Player can use this attack style with

name.description: The display name of the attack style

StackingEffectData.description: Data for constructing a StackingEffect object

stacksToAdd.description: The number of stacks of this effect to add per proc

modifiers.description: Modifiers that area applied to the target character per stack of this effect

maxStacks.description: The maximum number of stacks that this effect can have

name.description: The display name of the Effect

langeName.description: Optional. Defines the localization data to pull the name from.

AttackData.description: Data for constructing a SpecialAttack object

defaultChance.description: The default percentage chance that this attack is chosen

damage.description: Array of damage that is reduced to determine the damage dealt per hit of this attack

prehitEffects.description: Effects that are applied before the attack rolls to hit

onhitEffects.description: Effects that are applied only when the attack hits

cantMiss.description: If the attack cannot miss the target

attackCount.description: The number of times this attack procs

lifesteal.description: The percentage of damage dealt by this attack that should heal the attacker

consumesStacks.description: Optional. The ID of a stacking effect that this attack can consume the stacks of. On consuming the stacks, the attack will proc additional times based on the number of stacks consumed.

usesRunesPerProc.description: Optional. If the attack consumes spell rune costs per proc

usesPrayerPointsPerProc.description: Optional. If the attack consumes prayer points per proc

usesPotionChargesPerProc.description: Optional. If the attack consumes potion charges per proc

attackTypes.description: Optional. If present, limits the combat styles that are allowed to use this special attack to the members of the array

extraRuneConsumption.description: Optional. If present this special attack will require these runes to be used

isDragonbreath.description: Optional. f the attack is considered to be dragonbreath. Utilized for modifiers that reduce damage from dragonbreath.

minAccuracy.description: Optional. If present, the attack requires a minimum accuracy rating to always hit. Has no effect if cantMiss is false.

name.description: The display name of the Attack

description.description: The displayed description of the attack. Descriptions are automatically templated based on the attacks data.

descriptionGenerator.description: Optional. A templated string that can be used to auto-generate a templated description string for this attack

CombatPassiveData.description: Data for constructing a CombatPassive object

name.description: The display name of the Passive

modifiers.description: Modifiers that are provided to the enemy by the passive

customDescription.description: Optional. Specifies a custom description that overrides the description automatically generated from modifiers.

MonsterData.description: Data for constructing a Monster object

name.description: Display name of the Monster

description.description: Optional. Description displayed under the Monster's name

media.description: URI of the Image of the Monster

mediaAnimation.description: Optional. URI of an animated image of the Monster

levels.description: The combat levels of the Monster. Utilized to compute its stats.

Strength.description: Strength level. Impacts melee max hit.

Ranged.description: Ranged level. Impacts ranged accuracy and max hit.

Magic.description: Magic level. Impacts magic accuracy, max hit and evasion rating

equipmentStats.description: Equipment stats of the Monster. Used to calculate its stats.

ignoreCompletion.description: If true, this monster does not count for Completion.

attackType.description: The combat style the monster should use. random specifies the monster chose a random style at the start of combat

specialAttacks.description: Array of Special Attack IDs that the monster can use

overrideSpecialChances.description: Optional. If present, overrides the default chances of the special attacks this monster can use. Length must be identical to the length of specialAttacks.

passives.description: Array of Combat Passive IDs that monster has

lootChance.description: Percent chance that this monster should drop an item from its loot table.

lootTable.description: Defines the items that should drop from this monster

gpDrops.description: Determines how much GP can drop from this monster

bones.description: Optional. If present, the monster will always drop the specified item, outside of dungeons

itemID.description: The id of the item to drop

quantity.description: The quantity of the item to drop

canSlayer.description: Determines if the monster is Eligible to be a slayer task

isBoss.description: Determines if the monster is a boss

selectedSpell.description: The ID of the Standard Magic Spell this monster uses

pet.description: Optional. Defines a pet that will be dropped upon the specified quantity of monster kills.

id.description: The ID of the pet to drop

quantity.description: The number of this monster that must be killed for the pet

CombatAreaData.description: Data for constructing a CombatArea object

media.description: A URI for the area's image

SlayerAreaData.description: Data for constructing a SlayerArea object

areaEffectDescription.description: Describes the slayer area's effect. Templated by

areaEffect.description: Optional. If present the area will provide the given modifiers to the player or enemy

pet.description: Optional. If present, killing monsters in the area has a chance to drop a pet

areaEffectDescription.description: Describes the slayer area's effect. Set to null to clear the area's description.

areaEffect.description: If present the area will provide the given modifiers to the player or enemy. Set to null to clear the area's effect.

DungeonData.description: Data for constructing a Dungeon object

rewardItemIDs.description: An array of item IDs that will be rewarded when the dungeon is completed

oneTimeRewardID.description: Optional. If present this item will be rewarded upon the first completion of the dungeon

dropBones.description: If Monsters inside this dungeon should be allowed to drop their bone items

floors.description: Optional. If present the dungeon's progres will visually display as completing different floors. Each element represents the number of monsters per floor.

eventID.description: Optional. ID of a Combat Event. If present, this dungeon will instead start the corresponding Combat Event instead of the standard behaviour.

unlockRequirement.description: Optional. If present, this dungeon will require the dungeons specified to be completed first before it can be accessed

pet.description: Determines the Pet that is rolled for upon completing the dungeon

fixedPetClears.description: If true, the dungeons pet will be awarded when the dungeon has been completed a number of times equal to the weight property of the pet property, instead of rolling randomly

pauseOnBosses.description: If combat should pause before each Boss monster in the dungeon

nonBossPassives.description: Optional. If present the Combat Passives with the IDs given will be given to all non-boss monsters in the dungeon

unlockRequirement.description: This dungeon will require the dungeons specified to be completed first before it can be accessed

pet.description: Determines the Pet that is rolled for upon completing the dungeon

pauseOnBosses.description: If combat should pause before each Boss monster in the dungeon

nonBossPassives.description: Add or remove Combat Passives by ID to be given to all non-boss monsters in the dungeon

ObjectsToInsert.description: The IDs of the objects to insert

InsertEnd.description: Inserts objects at the end of the order

beforeID.description: The ID of the object to insert items before

InsertAfter.description: Inserts objects after the specified object

spellType.description: The type of the spell being cast. Used by the modifier system to grant specific bonuses to spells.

spellTier.description: The tier of the spell being cast. Used by the modifier system to grant specific bonuses to spells.

AltMagicSpellData.description: Data for constructing a AltMagicSpell object

description.description: The displayed description for the spell. Automatically templated.

baseExperience.description: The base experience earned per cast of the spell

fixedItemCosts.description: Optional. Defines item costs for the spell that do not change

specialCost.description: Defines the special costs for the spell.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item(s) that should be consumed

produces.description: Defines what the spell produces. Can either be a special production, or a set itemID.

PetData.description: Data for constructing a Pet object

name.description: The display name of the Pet

hint.description: Optional. If present, this will displayed as the hint for obtaining the pet instead of the autogenerated one.

langHint.description: Optional. Localization data for determining a custom pet hint

skillID.description: Optional. The ID of the skill that this pet is obtained from.

ignoreCompletion.description: If the pet should not count towards pet completion

enemyModifiers.description: Optional. Modifiers given to the enemy when this pet is owned
